Reading List for the Holidays

Posted on December 26, 2008

My holiday reading list.

  • Into Thin Air by Jon Krakauer (Mountain climbing aka living dangerously through others)
  • Dealers of Lightning by Michael Hiltzik (About Xerox PARC )
  • Real World Haskell (Sadly its on back order but their website has the full text)
  • Peopleware (Project / team management stuff)

Hoping the computer/work related topics give me some motivation and great ideas for 2009.

What are you reading over the next couple of weeks?
